headline: EDWARDS DIFFUSION PUMP
keywords: diffusion vacuum pumps diff pumps  diff pump
categories.lvl2: Vacuum Processing Equipment  >  Vacuum Pumps > Diffusion Pumps
specstable:
Manufacturer Edwards
Model MK2
Inlet Flange ISO-K 63.0 mm (2.480 in)
Foreline Flange KF 25.0 mm (0.984 in)
Pumping Speed Nitrogen 135.0 l/s (286.1 CFM)
Cooling Water Required Minimum Flow: 0.18 GPM (0.68 l/m) Minimum Temperature: 20 ºC (68 ºF, 293.00 ºK)
Water Connection 6 mm compresion couplings
Other Information

With quick-cool pump base option
Ultimate Pressure with recommended pump fluid: (Santovac 5) 3x10 minus 8 mbar
Available with 110 Volt or 230 Volt heater

Exterior Dimensions
Width 8.268 in (21.0 cm)
Height 12.992 in (33.0 cm)
Weight 18 lb (8 kg)
